scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development PORT=3000 S3_REGION=us-east-1 S3_ENDPOINT=http://minio:9000 S3_ACCESS_KEY_ID=minioadmin S3_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=minioadmin S3_BUCKET_NAME=downloads S3_FORCE_PATH_STYLE=true DOWNLOAD_DELAY_ENABLED=true DOWNLOAD_DELAY_MIN_MS=5000 DOWNLOAD_DELAY_MAX_MS=15000 REQUEST_TIMEOUT_MS=30000 RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW_MS=60000 RATE_LIMIT_MAX_REQUESTS=100 CORS_ORIGINS=* node --experimental-transform-types --watch src/index.ts
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development PORT=3000 S3_REGION=us-east-1 S3_ENDPOINT=http://minio:9000 S3_ACCESS_KEY_ID=minioadmin S3_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=minioadmin S3_BUCKET_NAME=downloads S3_FORCE_PATH_STYLE=true DOWNLOAD_DELAY_ENABLED=true DOWNLOAD_DELAY_MIN_MS=10000 DOWNLOAD_DELAY_MAX_MS=120000 REQUEST_TIMEOUT_MS=30000 RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW_MS=60000 RATE_LIMIT_MAX_REQUESTS=100 CORS_ORIGINS=* node --experimental-transform-types src/index.ts
